sentences.sContent: ...Contestants of elite high school math competitions are mostly Asian and white students from well-off 	families...
...The scientists tracked white storks from different colonies in Europe and Africa...
...which are overwhelmingly dominated by Asian and white students from middle- class and affluent families...
...Landfill sites on the Iberian peninsula have long attracted local white storks...
...Why did white settlers introduce alcohol to Indians...
...Indians likewise had their traditional life taken from them by white settlers who often encourage them to consume alcohol to prevent them from fighting back...
...Antarctica is no longer dominated by the traditional white nations...
...The old days of the Antarctic being dominated by the interests and wishes of white men from European...
...and had fewer joint activities than the white pairs...
...The roommate’s race had no effect on the grades of white students or low-scoring black students...

phrases.pCn: n. 白宫（美国政府的行政机关，美国总统官邸）
白噪声（用以掩盖令人心烦的杂音）
n. 白马；怀特霍斯（加拿大育空地区首府）；白马像（新石器时代、青铜时代或铁器时代雕刻在英国伯克郡等白垩山冈上）

words.tran: 白，洁白，苍白；[矿业] 白度

trans.tranOther: belonging to the race of people with pale skin
